trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs 类用于事件为提供的值**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件并使您能够指定为当前请求的自定义 Windows 标识。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>构造使用提供的 IIS 和当前的 Windows 标识的 WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs 对象<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>和将其传递给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs 对象提供给属性**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>向自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>期间属性**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，Windows IIS 提供的标识用作当前请求的标识。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>属性设置为返回的标识<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**引发事件时，才身份验证<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>和<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新创建的实例的<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>构造<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>对象使用提供的 IIS 和当前的 Windows 标识<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>和将其传递给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity object.
trans-unit.target: Windows 标识对象。

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>为当前 HTTP 请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>提供对访问<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>为当前请求的对象。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>为当前 HTTP 请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows identity passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 获取传递到的 Windows 标识<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>构造<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>对象使用提供的 IIS 和当前的 Windows 标识<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>和将其传递给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, the Identity property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，标识属性设置为返回的标识<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Windows 标识传递给<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象要与当前请求相关联。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can use the User property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用用户属性设置<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>向自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the User property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定在用户属性的值**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，Windows IIS 提供的标识用作当前请求的标识。

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>属性设置为返回的标识<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象要与当前请求相关联。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>
